meanings.definition: Made elastic by the addition of rubber or similar stretchy material.
meanings.sent1: The elasticized band stretched easily around my wrist.
meanings.sent2: Her elasticized pants were comfortable for yoga.
meanings.sent3: The elasticized hair tie snapped playfully on his wrist.
meanings.sent4: The elasticized fabric hugged her body like a second skin.
meanings.sent5: The elasticized rubber band bounced back when stretched.

meanings.definition: To make something elastic by adding rubber or similar stretchy material.
meanings.sent1: She elasticized the waistband of her skirt for a better fit.
meanings.sent2: The tailor elasticized the sleeves of the jacket for flexibility.
meanings.sent3: He elasticized the slingshot to launch the pebble farther.
meanings.sent4: The chef elasticized the dough to create a fluffy texture.
meanings.sent5: They elasticized the rope to make it more resilient for climbing.
